item.title: Stacey add a quote by Mitch Albom
item.description: "Death ends a life, not a relationship." -- Mitch Albom

item.title: Stacey add a quote by S.E. Hinton
item.description: "If you have two friends in your lifetime, you're lucky. If you have one <I>good</i> friend, you're more than lucky." -- S.E. Hinton

item.title: Stacey add a quote by Richard Bach
item.description: "Can miles truly separate you from friends... If you want to be with someone you love, aren't you already there?" -- Richard Bach

item.title: Stacey add a quote by Richard Bach
item.description: "Every person, all the events of your life are there because you have drawn them there. What you choose to do with them is up to you." -- Richard Bach

item.title: Stacey add a quote by Steve Maraboli
item.description: "I promise you nothing is as chaotic as it seems. Nothing is worth diminishing your health. Nothing is worth poisoning yourself into stress, anxiety, and fear." -- Steve Maraboli

item.title: Stacey add a quote by Fred Rogers
item.description: "In times of stress, the best thing we can do for each other is to listen with our ears and our hearts and to be assured that our questions are just as important as our answers." -- Fred Rogers

item.title: Stacey add a quote by Shantideva
item.description: "If the problem can be solved why worry? If the problem cannot be solved worrying will do you no good." -- Shantideva

item.title: Stacey add a quote by William J. Clinton
item.description: "Sometimes when people are under stress, they hate to think, and it's the time when they most need to think." -- William J. Clinton
